subject: bs-ux-2 complete — AgentRelationshipTopology.tsx
body:
Redirected to bs-ux-2 per sprint activation. Delivered:

File: apps/web-next/src/views/AgentRelationshipTopology.tsx
Lines: 1169 | TypeScript: 0 errors

4 tabs:
• Spawn Tree — recursive hierarchical tree (border-l CSS connectors) showing full Xavier→Luis→workers spawn chain with expand/collapse, edge kind badges (Spawned/Delegated/Reports To), session IDs, live status
• Topology Map — CSS absolute-positioned hierarchical layout (Exec/Lead/Worker tiers), div-based edge lines with angle+length math, click-to-select node with SelectedAgentPanel showing inbound/outbound relationships
• Session Chains — 4 named chains (Horizon Sprint, Arch Review, ThemeEditor, Bundle Opt), expandable horizontal step cards with edge kind theming
• Event Stream — 14 topology events with filter bar (Spawn/Delegate/Complete/Message/Error), vertical timeline line, summary count pills

Differentiated from bs-ux-1 (AgentCollaborationGraph): this view is structural spawn/delegation topology, not communication frequency.

Data self-referentially models bs-ux-2 itself (quinn-2 node spawned for this task).
